title: Hierbabuena
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A nice place that's nearly all vegetarian, with occasional fish dish. The focus is on natural ingredients, fruit and vegetable. Interesting range of salads (all vegan) including a falafel salad and a green curry salad with vegan cheese. Variety of fruit/vegetable smoothies (some with yogurt), lemonade, and other fruit juices.
